snippet: Police say a speeding truck has overturned and crushed to death 10 people, including seven children, sleeping on a sidewalk in northern India....

headline.print_headline: Speeding Truck Overturns, Kills 10 in India
headline.main: Speeding Truck Overturns, Kills 10 in India

lead_paragraph: Police say a speeding truck has overturned and crushed to death 10 people, including seven children, sleeping on a sidewalk in northern India.
